DcCurrent_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name DcCurrent, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

DcActivePower_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name DcActivePower, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

DcCurrent_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name DcCurrent, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

DcVoltage_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name DcVoltage, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

AcCurrentPe_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name AcCurrentPe, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

AcActivePowerTotal_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name AcActivePowerTotal, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary
Unit designator for property and event with name AcActivePowerTotal, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

AcActivePowerPe_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name AcActivePowerPe, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

AcCurrentPe_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name AcCurrentPe, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

AcReactivePowerPe_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name AcReactivePowerPe, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

AcVoltagePe_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name AcVoltagePe, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

AcVoltagePp_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name AcVoltagePp, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

ModeID.description: ID of the destination energy saving mode (0xFE)  if successful, otherwise unchanged.

CurrentTimeToDestination.description: Time needed to reach the energy saving mode if successful, otherwise unchanged.

RegularTimeToOperate.description: Time needed to reach PE_ready_to_operate again if the destination energy saving mode will be regularly terminated if successful, otherwise unchanged.

TimeMinLengthOfStay.description: Time of minimum stay in the destination energy saving mode if successful, otherwise unchanged.

MeasurementValue.description: Stand-in for an unspecified data type.

data.description: Stand-in for an unspecified data type.

IDDestination.description: Identification of destination energy saving mode.

CurrentTimeToDestination.description: Time needed to reach the mode IDDestination. Shall be a Worst case value if ongoing (dynamic) time value is not supported. Shall be 0 if destination energy saving mode is reached.

CurrentTimeToOperate.description: Time needed to reach READY_TO_OPERATE if the energy saving mode is not regularly terminated. The server might update the value after reaching the destination state as long as the TimeMinLengthOfStay of the destination state is not reached.

EnergyConsumptionToDestination.description: Energy consumption for actual transition. Shall be 0 if not in a transition state.

IDSource.description: PROFIenergy mode ID of current energy saving mode. Servers not implementing PROFIenergy shall always set this field to 0.

IDDestination.description: PROFIenergy mode ID of destination energy saving mode. Servers not implementing PROFIenergy shall always set this field to 0.

RegularTimeToOperate.description: Time needed to reach READY_TO_OPERATE if the energy saving mode is regularly terminated. Shall be 0 if IDSource is equal to 0xFF (The StandbyManagementStatus variable has the value READY_TO_OPERATE).

IDDestination.description: Identification of destination energy saving mode.

CurrentTimeToDestination.description: Time needed to reach the mode IDDestination. Shall be a Worst case value if ongoing (dynamic) time value is not supported. Shall be 0 if destination energy saving mode is reached.

CurrentTimeToOperate.description: Time needed to reach READY_TO_OPERATE if the energy saving mode is not regularly terminated. The server might update the value after reaching the destination state as long as the TimeMinLengthOfStay of the destination state is not reached.

EnergyConsumptionToDestination.description: Energy consumption for actual transition. Shall be 0 if not in a transition state.

IDSource.description: PROFIenergy mode ID of current energy saving mode. Servers not implementing PROFIenergy shall always set this field to 0.

IDDestination.description: PROFIenergy mode ID of destination energy saving mode. Servers not implementing PROFIenergy shall always set this field to 0.

RegularTimeToOperate.description: Time needed to reach READY_TO_OPERATE if the energy saving mode is regularly terminated. Shall be 0 if IDSource is equal to 0xFF (The StandbyManagementStatus variable has the value READY_TO_OPERATE).

CurrentTimeToOperate.description: Time needed to reach PE_ready_to_operate if successful, otherwise unchanged.

ModeID.description: ID of the destination energy saving mode if successful, otherwise unchanged.

CurrentTimeToDestination.description: Time needed to reach the energy saving mode if successful, otherwise unchanged.

RegularTimeToOperate.description: Time needed to reach PE_ready_to_operate again if the destination energy saving mode will be regularly terminated if successful, otherwise unchanged.

TimeMinLengthOfStay.description: Time of minimum stay in the destination energy saving mode if successful, otherwise unchanged.

ModeID.description: ID of the requested energy saving mode.

EffectiveModeID.description: ID of the effectively chosen destination energy saving mode if successful, otherwise current mode.

CurrentTimeToDestination.description: Time needed to reach the destination energy saving mode if successful, otherwise unchanged.

RegularTimeToOperate.description: Time needed to reach PE_ready_to_operate again if the destination energy saving mode will be regularly terminated if successful, otherwise unchanged.

TimeMinLengthOfStay.description: Time of minimum stay in the destination energy saving mode if successful, otherwise unchanged.
